abstract: Hanging over both chambers is the specter of yet another serious fiscal fight this week, with longer-term battles over trade, regulations and how best to stimulate the economy also on the horizon.
snippet: Hanging over both chambers is the specter of yet another serious fiscal fight this week, with longer-term battles over trade, regulations and how best to stimulate the economy also on the horizon.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON - Congress returns on Monday after a week off, but it was the sort of recess during which it rains every day, and no one gets to play on the swings. Hanging over both chambers is the specter of yet another serious fiscal fight this week, with longer-term battles over trade, regulations and how best to stimulate the economy also on the horizon.

headline.main: Back From Break, Congress Has a Full Plate
